Reviews.Title: “excellent value, location. just one issue”
Reviews.Author: Rob a
Reviews.Content: excellent value playa considering location youre familiar pdc havent easy beach main ave else degrees worse true 5th ave center diningshopping etc pdc growing main street definitely choice grown noise night traffic easy 5 7 min walk plaza beach distance hotel 3 condition bugs pests excellent family oriented service friendly helpful included breakfast definitely average maybe plazas biggest bargain price clientele noisy 13 am hallway carpet knock noise annoying

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: lovetheyucatan
Reviews.Content: enjoyed 5 night stay hotel plaza spacious clean beds comfortable stayed 2 roomsuite kitchen decent sized bathroom shower plenty hot water pressure nice staff cleaned daily location thank hospitality hello gina front desk
